verses.verse: הַֽלְלוּיָ֨הּ׀ <S%H1984><s%> hal-lu-Yah Praise הוֹד֣וּ <S%H3034><s%> ho-Du O give thanks לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov; for [he is] good כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do. for his mercy

מִ֗י <S%H4310><s%> Mi, Who יְ֭מַלֵּל <S%H4448><s%> Ye-mal-lel Who can utter גְּבוּר֣וֹת <S%H1369><s%> ge-vu-Rot the mighty acts יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD יַ֝שְׁמִ֗יעַ <S%H8085><s%> yash-Mi-a', show כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all תְּהִלָּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H8416><s%> te-hil-la-To. deep

אַ֭שְׁרֵי <S%H835><s%> 'Ash-rei Blessed שֹׁמְרֵ֣י <S%H8104><s%> sho-me-Rei [are] they that keep מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> mish-Pat; judgment עֹשֵׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh [and] he that doeth צְדָקָ֣ה <S%H6666><s%> tze-da-Kah righteousness בְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol- all עֵֽת׃ <S%H6256><s%> 'Et. at all times

זָכְרֵ֣נִי <S%H2142><s%> za-che-Re-ni Remember יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh me O LORD בִּרְצ֣וֹן <S%H7522><s%> bir-Tzon with the favour עַמֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Me-cha; [that thou bearest unto] thy people פָּ֝קְדֵ֗נִי <S%H6485><s%> pa-ke-De-ni, O visit בִּישׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3444><s%> bi-shu-'a-Te-cha. me with thy salvation

לִרְא֤וֹת׀ <S%H7200><s%> lir-'ot That I may see בְּט֘וֹבַ֤ת <S%H2896><s%> be-To-Vat the good בְּחִירֶ֗יךָ <S%H972><s%> be-chi-Rei-cha, of thy chosen לִ֭שְׂמֹחַ <S%H8055><s%> Lis-mo-ach that I may rejoice בְּשִׂמְחַ֣ת <S%H8057><s%> be-sim-Chat in the gladness גּוֹיֶ֑ךָ <S%H1471><s%> go-Ye-cha; of thy nation לְ֝הִתְהַלֵּ֗ל <S%H1984><s%> le-hit-hal-Lel, that I may glory עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with נַחֲלָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-Te-cha. with thine inheritance

חָטָ֥אנוּ <S%H2398><s%> cha-Ta-nu We have sinned עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- like אֲבוֹתֵ֗ינוּ <S%H1><s%> a-vo-Tei-nu, with our fathers הֶעֱוִ֥ינוּ <S%H5753><s%> he-'e-Vi-nu we have committed iniquity הִרְשָֽׁעְנוּ׃ <S%H7561><s%> hir-Sha-'e-nu. we have done wickedly

אֲב֘וֹתֵ֤ינוּ <S%H1><s%> a-Vo-Tei-nu Our fathers בְמִצְרַ֨יִם׀ <S%H4714><s%> ve-mitz-Ra-yim in Egypt לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not הִשְׂכִּ֬ילוּ <S%H7919><s%> his-Ki-lu understood נִפְלְאוֹתֶ֗יךָ <S%H6381><s%> nif-le-'o-Tei-cha, not thy wonders לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo did not זָ֭כְרוּ <S%H2142><s%> Za-che-ru they remembered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> ro not the multitude חֲסָדֶ֑יךָ <S%H2617><s%> cha-sa-Dei-cha; of thy mercies וַיַּמְר֖וּ <S%H4784><s%> vai-yam-Ru but provoked עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- by יָ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> yam [him] at the sea בְּיַם־ <S%H3220><s%> be-yam- sea סֽוּף׃ <S%H5488><s%> Suf. [even] at the Red

וַֽ֭יּוֹשִׁיעֵם <S%H3467><s%> Vai-yo-shi-'em Nevertheless he saved לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an the sake שְׁמ֑וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo; them for his name's לְ֝הוֹדִ֗יעַ <S%H3045><s%> le-ho-Di-a', to be known אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- גְּבוּרָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1369><s%> ge-vu-ra-To. sake that he might make his mighty power

וַיִּגְעַ֣ר <S%H1605><s%> vai-yig-'Ar He rebuked בְּיַם־ <S%H3220><s%> be-yam- sea ס֭וּף <S%H5488><s%> suf the Red וַֽיֶּחֱרָ֑ב <S%H2717><s%> vai-ye-che-Rav; also and it was dried up וַיּוֹלִיכֵ֥ם <S%H1980><s%> vai-yo-li-Chem led בַּ֝תְּהֹמ֗וֹת <S%H8415><s%> bat-te-ho-Mot, them through the depths כַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> kam-mid-Bar. as through the wilderness

וַיְכַסּוּ־ <S%H3680><s%> vay-chas-su- covered מַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim And the waters צָרֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6862><s%> tza-rei-Hem; their enemies אֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad there was not one מֵ֝הֶ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> me-Hem, like לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not נוֹתָֽר׃ <S%H3498><s%> no-Tar. of them left

וַיַּאֲמִ֥ינוּ <S%H539><s%> vai-ya-'a-Mi-nu Then believed בִדְבָרָ֑יו <S%H1697><s%> vid-va-Rav; they his words יָ֝שִׁ֗ירוּ <S%H7891><s%> ya-Shi-ru, they sang תְּהִלָּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H8416><s%> te-hil-la-To. his praise

מִֽ֭הֲרוּ <S%H4116><s%> Mi-ha-ru They soon שָׁכְח֣וּ <S%H7911><s%> sha-che-Chu forgat מַעֲשָׂ֑יו <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Sav; his works לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not חִ֝כּ֗וּ <S%H2442><s%> chik-Ku, they waited לַעֲצָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H6098><s%> la-'a-tza-To. not for his counsel

וַיִּתְאַוּ֣וּ <S%H183><s%> vai-yit-'av-Vu But lusted תַ֭אֲוָה <S%H8378><s%> Ta-'a-vah exceedingly בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar; in the wilderness וַיְנַסּוּ־ <S%H5254><s%> vay-nas-su- and tempted אֵ֝֗ל <S%H410><s%> 'El, God בִּֽישִׁימֽוֹן׃ <S%H3452><s%> Bi-shi-Mon. in the desert

וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten And he gave לָ֭הֶם <S%H1992><s%> La-hem them שֶׁאֱלָתָ֑ם <S%H7596><s%> she-'e-la-Tam; them their request וַיְשַׁלַּ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> vay-shal-Lach but sent רָז֣וֹן <S%H7332><s%> ra-Zon leanness בְּנַפְשָֽׁם׃ <S%H5315><s%> be-naf-Sham. into their soul
